name: A5 Landscape Notebook {Natural Rose}
description:
Beställda : Letterpressed Leather

Capturing the tactile beauty of letterpress and the sensuous texture of natural vegetable tan leather this notebook showcases the craftsmanship behind letterpress printing and leather work.

This notebook is A5 in size and features silver double-o wiring which allows the notebook to lie flat or fold around on itself for easy writing.

Inside you will find 80 pages of 110gsm paper printed in our subtle and stunning Autumn ink, designed with two columns for efficient use of space - perfect for those vital “To Do List”.

As leather is a natural product it will not always be perfect. It is these very imperfections that make each piece beautiful, individual and unique. All leather carries markings and variations, this is not a product defect, but proof that it is natural leather.

name: Backpack Large : Tan/Black
description:
Looking for a unique backpack that turns into a over the shoulder bag?

This beauty fits a 15" laptop in the front compartment with a larger second compartment for everything else. A pocket inside perfectly holds your phone and keys for easy access. 

This bag comes in a choice of three colour schemes. (See photo).
Tan/Black
Black/Natural
Natural/Tan

All of our leather backpacks, pencil cases, and laptop sleeves are made with traditional techniques to ensure durability. With the option to add engraved initials, and the natural markings of vegetable leather different on every item, your purchase will truly be one of a kind.

Dimensions: 39cm wide x 28 high x 14cm deep
Inside pocket: 18.5 x 13 x 1cm. Pocket perfect for phone and keys. 
Straps: 65cm long, adjustable length, removable. Additional shoulder strap

Made to order. Please allow 2 working weeks for items to be crafted.

We want your Marvellous purchase to last for many years to come. So if anything should happen please return items for a full repair.

name: Backpack Small : Rose : Tan/Black
description:
FEATURES 
• Laser etched floral design 
• Detachable inside pouch for keys and phone
• Roomy interior to fit everyday necessities and more
• Double press studs to allow for that extra full backpack
• Adjustable straps
• Removable handle
• Personalisation 
• FREE shipping on orders over $100

31cm wide x 25cm high x 14cm deep

Look after your posture with this backpack perfect for everyday use. This bag will ware with you as you use it. It develops character and softens as you use it over time. The "natural" colour of vegetable tan leather will naturally honey and darken over time.


Our leather products are handmade with traditional techniques to ensure durability. With the option to add engraved initials, and the natural markings of vegetable leather different on every item, your purchase will truly be one of a kind.

name: Hand Clutch : Pencil Case : Tan/Black
description:
Durable and ever so good looking pencil case. It also has a multifunction of being a pretty unique hand clutch or make up case. Holds sunnies, keys, phone and cards. The triangle shape gives a modern flair. 

Marvellous creates handmade products using vegetable tan leather, which means you can rest easy knowing that in the making of your latest favourite purchase there were no chemicals used.

Perfect for anything from a birthday gift to a quirky but practical present for yourself, all the leather pencil cases are made with traditional techniques to ensure durability. name: Keyring {Floral}
description:
Beställda : Letterpressed Leather

Capturing the tactile beauty of letterpress and the sensuous texture of natural vegetable tan leather these key rings showcase the craftsmanship behind letterpress printing and leather work.

Never lose your keys again with a D ring for extra keys and a clasp to clip onto your bag.

As leather is a natural product it will not always be perfect. It is these very imperfections that make each piece beautiful, individual and unique. All leather carries markings and variations, this is not a product defect, but proof that it is natural leather. 

We introduce to you – Letterpressed Leather.

Bestallda was born out of the desire to combine two beautiful and historic forms of craftsmanship, capturing the tactile beauty of letterpress and the sensuous texture of natural vegetable tan leather.

name:
Letterpress Greeting Card :
Happy Birthday
description:
Give the most elegant Happy Birthday card at the party.

The feel and texture of this card, starting from the moment you lay your eyes on the unique envelope, will make your receiver think they are pretty special.

All Marvellous cards fit perfectly in a 6x4" photo frame to make the memories last longer.

- Made from 100% cotton card stock 
- Traditional letterpress technique to make an embossed effect 
- The most stunning custom blind embossed envelope come with every purchase.

Size: C6 Card and Envelope.

Available in a pack of 5.

Express Shipping on this item. 
Orders are posted 3 - 5 days from purchase date.
